alert.note: Alert for Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 14 at 8:11PM MDT until March 16 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Total snow accumulations between 5 and 11 inches. * WHERE...Southern Rocky Mountain Front. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult and tire chains may be required for some vehicles. Those in the backcountry should ensure they are prepared for dangerous conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest period of snow is expected late tonight into Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.
